traits.name: Acidic Flesh
traits.desc: Ranged projectiles that hit the alchemist are dissolved and cannot be recovered.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist makes two attacks with its claws or one with its caustic burst.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Caustic Bile
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
